new_posts.title: GPT-5.2 is now generally available in GitHub Copilot
new_posts.summary: GPT-5.2 is generally available to Copilot Enterprise, Copilot Business, Copilot Pro, and Copilot Pro+. You’ll now be able to access the model in GitHub Copilot Chat on github.com, GitHub Mobi

new_posts.title: GPT-5.1-Codex-Max is now generally available in GitHub Copilot
new_posts.summary: GPT-5.1-Codex-Max is generally available to Copilot Enterprise, Copilot Business, Copilot Pro, and Copilot Pro+. You’ll now be able to access the model in GitHub Copilot Chat on github.com, G

new_posts.title: GPT-5.1 and GPT-5.1-Codex are now generally available in GitHub Copilot
new_posts.summary: GPT-5.1 and GPT-5.1-Codex are generally available to Copilot Enterprise, Copilot Business, Copilot Pro, and Copilot Pro+. You’ll now be able to access the model in GitHub Copilot Chat on gith

new_posts.title: Copilot code review now available for organization members without a license
new_posts.summary: Organizations can now apply Copilot code review to all pull requests, including those from contributors without a Copilot license. Usage is billed seamlessly to the organization as premium requests

new_posts.title: Dynamic Copilot prompts on GitHub Docs
new_posts.summary: You can now launch GitHub Copilot prompts directly from select pages on GitHub Docs. We’ve introduced dynamic GitHub Copilot prompts, making it easy to move seamlessly from documentation to C

new_posts.title: Gemini 3 Flash is now in public preview for GitHub Copilot
new_posts.summary:
Gemini 3 Flash, ideal for tasks where speed is crucial, is now rolling out in public preview in GitHub Copilot. Availability in GitHub Copilot Gemini 3 Flash is now rolling…
